title: American Marathon Runners Are Faster Than Ever
description: American women have been breaking national marathon records this year and Conner Mantz, a 25-year-old from Utah, had a stellar marathon debut for the men. But can Americans win major races?
dc:creator: Matthew Futterman
media:credit: Quinn Harris/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Emily Sisson set an American marathon record during the Chicago Marathon last month, breaking the mark set by Keira Dâ€™Amato earlier this year.
